co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.infineon

Class NfcUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.infineon.NfcUtils

  • public class NfcUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utils class used to interact with the Infineon card via NFC.

    • Method Detail

      • generateSignature

        public static GenerateSignatureResponseApdu generateSignature(NfcTranceiver card,
                                                              int keyIndex,
                                                              byte[] dataToSign,
                                                              byte[] pin)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                                              NfcCardException
        Generate an ECDSA signature.
        Parameters:
        card - nfc card
        keyIndex - index of the key to use
        dataToSign - data to be signed (hash)
        Returns:
        signature data as byte array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on communication errors
        NfcCardException - when card returns something other than 0x9000 or 0x61XX

      • readPublicKeyOrCreateIfNotExists

        public static GetKeyInfoResponseApdu readPublicKeyOrCreateIfNotExists(NfcTranceiver card,
                                                                      int keyIndex)
                                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                      NfcCardException
        Read public key from card, or create a new one if it doesn't exist yet.
        Parameters:
        card - nfc card
        Returns:
        public key as hexadecimal String
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on communication errors
        NfcCardException - when card returns something other than 0x9000 or 0x61XX

      • generateKeyFromSeed

        public static boolean generateKeyFromSeed(NfcTranceiver card,
                                          byte[] seed)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          NfcCardException
        Creates a new key on index 0 within the card, derived by the given seed. Giving the same seed will always create the same key on the card.
        Parameters:
        card - nfc tranceiver
        seed - key derivation seed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on communication errors
        NfcCardException - when card returns something other than 0x9000 or 0x61XX

      • initializePinAndReturnPuk

        public static byte[] initializePinAndReturnPuk(NfcTranceiver card,
                                               byte[] pinBytes)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               NfcCardException
        Initial set up of the PIN. This is only allowed in the PIN inactive state.
        Parameters:
        card - nfc tranceiver
        pinBytes - new pin to set (any byte array with length between 4 and 63 bytes is allowed)
        Returns:
        PUK bytes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on communication errors
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given PIN is null or shorter than 4 bytes or longer than 63 bytes
        NfcCardException - when card returns something other than 0x9000 or 0x61XX

      • changePin

        public static byte[] changePin(NfcTranceiver card,
                               byte[] currentPin,
                               byte[] newPin)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               NfcCardException
        Change current PIN to a new PIN. This is only allowed in the PIN active state.
        Parameters:
        card - nfc tranceiver
        currentPin - current PIN
        newPin - new PIN
        Returns:
        PUK bytes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on communication errors
        NfcCardException - when card returns something other than 0x9000 or 0x61XX

      • unlockPin

        public static boolean unlockPin(NfcTranceiver card,
                                byte[] puk)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                NfcCardException
        Unlock PIN with PUK to get back into PIN inactive state.
        Parameters:
        card - nfc tranceiver
        puk - PUK bytes
        Returns:
        if unlocking worked or not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on communication errors
        NfcCardException - when card returns something other than 0x9000 or 0x61XX

      • verifyPin

        public static boolean verifyPin(NfcTranceiver card,
                                byte[] pin)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                NfcCardException
        Verify PIN if correct or not and return as boolean.
        Parameters:
        card - nfc tranceiver
        pin - PIN to verify
        Returns:
        if verified or not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on communication errors
        NfcCardException - when card returns something other than 0x9000 or 0x61XX
